location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 14: James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, informs William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay, that, following his letter of 1 March 1824 (see the previous item in this volume), another packet has been received from Henry Willock, which will be sent along with the earlier packet.
